name: Passing the Ball
description:
It's important for kids to know how to safely use and enjoy digital technologies. Help your kid be their own first line of defense. Protect them from dangers, but don't be afraid to pass them the ball once in a while.

This is a Flash game made by Gregory Avery-Weir in 2011 for GDC Online and WebWiseKids. It's now available as a downloadable projector for the first time.

If you donate at least $5, you can download full source code and resources for the game. If you're interested in the source for more than one game, check out my Flash Source Code Collection.

Please note: source code is provided without license or support. It might not compile at all, as it may be missing third-party resources.
